channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Unica Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Unica Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-37498|2024-08-02T17:16:29.966Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: A user is capable of assigning him/herself to arbitrary groups by reusing a POST request issued by an administrator. It is possible that an attacker could potentially escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-37500|2024-08-02T17:16:30.467Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: A Persistent Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability can be carried out on certain pages of Unica Platform. An attacker could hijack a user's session and perform other attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-37497|2024-08-02T17:16:30.168Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: The Unica application exposes an API which accepts arbitrary XML input. By manipulating the given XML, an authenticated attacker with certain rights can successfully perform XML External Entity attacks (XXE) against the backend service.

item.title: CVE-2023-37499|2024-08-02T17:16:30.332Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica%20platform
item.description: A Persistent Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability can be carried out in a certain field of the Unica Platform. An attacker could hijack a user's session and perform other attacks.
